1.9.3  The IRTC CDROM (Year Two)

The IRTC CDROM (Year Two) is a compilation of all entries made to the Internet Raytracing Competition during its second year of operation. As the IRTC is bi-monthly, this covers round #7 (May/June 1997) to round #12 (March/April 1998). It also includes the first three rounds of the IRTC Animations competition. As this runs every three months, this means that it includes round #1 (15 Oct 1997 - 15 Jan 1998), round #2 (15 Jan 1998 - 15 Apr 1998), and round #3 (15 Apr 1998 - 15 July 1998).


Sample Images from The IRTC CDROM, Year Two

It also contains a large (800x600) MPG version of the winning 'Batteries Not Included' animation from the 'Toys' round (April-July 1998), as well as a 640x480 AVI generated directory from the TGA files. This latter file is 180mb in size!

This CD is similar to most respects to the Year One CD in terms of its presentation and layout. See »http://www.aussie.org/products/ for more information and to order from our secure server.
